text: Nekudaro ngirozi dzakamudaidza apo akanga akamira pamunamato ari mukamuri yekunamatira, (dzichiti): “Allah vanokupa mashoko akanaka aYahya (Johwani – uchava nemwana Johwani), achange achitenda mushoko kubva kuna Allah (rekusikwa kwaJesu neshoko raAllah kuti: “Ivapo!” Uye obva avapo), anoremekedzwa, ari kure kubva kune bonde nevakadzi, uye muporofita kubva kune vanoita mabasa akanaka.”
